title: Web & API Development
text: I design and build high-performance web applications using modern frameworks such as Django, FastAPI, Flask, Node.js, and React. My services include custom REST API development, backend architecture, database design, and full-stack web solutions tailored to your business needs.

title: Data Analytics & Automation
text: I help businesses make data-driven decisions through data cleaning, analysis, visualization, and automation. Using Python, SQL, and analytical tools, I transform raw data into actionable insights and build automated workflows that improve efficiency, accuracy, and overall operational performance for organizations.

title: DevOps, Cloud & Deployment Services
text: I deploy, scale, and optimize applications using Docker, CI/CD pipelines, AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure. Services include containerization, automated deployments, server optimization, and secure cloud infrastructure setup, ensuring high availability, faster delivery cycles, and robust system reliability across worldwide.
